verses.verse: <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, the Lord of <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G1722>with<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> there <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4864>assembly<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> with a gold <S%G5554>ring<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2986>goodly<s%> <S%G2066>apparel<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> there come <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a poor <S%G4434>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4508>vile<s%> <S%G2066>raiment<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> ye have <S%G1914>respect<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> him that <S%G5409>weareth<s%> the <S%G2986>gay<s%> <S%G2066>clothing<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2521>Sit<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> in a good <S%G2573>place<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor<s%>, <S%G2476>Stand<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2521>sit<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5286>footstool<s%>:

Are <S%G1252>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G1252>partial<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2923>judges<s%> of <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts<s%>?

<S%G191>Hearken<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1586>Hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1586>chosen<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he hath <S%G1861>promised<s%> to them that <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>?

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> have <S%G818>despised<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%>. <S%G2616>Do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> rich <S%G4145>men<s%> <S%G2616>oppress<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846%G1670>draw<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>before<s%> the judgment <S%G2922>seats<s%>?
<S%G987>Do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G987>blaspheme<s%> that <S%G2570>worthy<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> the which <S%G5209>ye<s%> are <S%G1941>called<s%>?

<S%G1487%G3305>If<s%> ye <S%G5055>fulfil<s%> the <S%G937>royal<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%>, Thou shalt <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4139>neighbour<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>, ye <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye have respect to <S%G4380>persons<s%>, ye <S%G2038>commit<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, and are <S%G1651>convinced<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3848>transgressors<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3748>whosoever<s%> shall <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>, and <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G4417>offend<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> point, he <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G1777>guilty<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> he that <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3431>Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G5407>Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5407>kill<s%>. <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> thou <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, yet <S%G1161>if<s%> thou <S%G5407>kill<s%>, thou art <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

<S%G3779>So<s%> speak <S%G2980>ye<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> they that shall <S%G3195>be<s%> <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1657>liberty<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> he shall have <S%G2920>judgment<s%> without <S%G448>mercy<s%>, that hath <S%G4160>shewed<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> rejoiceth <S%G2620>against<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%>.

<S%G5101>What<s%> doth it <S%G3786>profit<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1437>though<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> he <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>? <S%G1410%G3361>can<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>?
<S%G1437%G1161>If<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%> <S%G5225>be<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3007%G5600>destitute<s%> of <S%G2184>daily<s%> <S%G5160>food<s%>,

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5217>Depart<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, be ye <S%G2328>warmed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5526>filled<s%>; <S%G1161>notwithstanding<s%> ye <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> those things which are <S%G2006>needful<s%> to the <S%G4983>body<s%>; <S%G5101>what<s%> doth it <S%G3786>profit<s%>?
<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G3362>if<s%> it <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3362>not<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>, being <S%G2596%G1438>alone<s%>.

<S%G235>Yea<s%>, a <S%G5100>man<s%> may <S%G2046>say<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, and <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>: <S%G1166>shew<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1537>without<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, and <S%G2504>I<s%> will <S%G1166>shew<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>.

<S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G4100>believest<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; thou <S%G4160>doest<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%>: the <S%G1140>devils<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5425>tremble<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2309>wilt<s%> thou <S%G1097>know<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G2756>vain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>?

<S%G1344>Was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, when he had <S%G399>offered<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%>?

Seest <S%G991>thou<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4903>wrought<s%> with <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G5048>was<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> made <S%G5048>perfect<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which <S%G3004%G1161>saith<s%>, <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> it was <S%G3049>imputed<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he was <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5384>Friend<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Ye <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G5106>then<s%> how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>.

<S%G3668%G1161>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1344>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4460>Rahab<s%> the <S%G4204>harlot<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, when she had <S%G5264>received<s%> the <S%G32>messengers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had sent them <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.
